creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: profile of white crane facing R, beak partially open, head pointed toward UR; light blue-grey water with darker blue ripples; black cattails and reeds at LL, grey reeds in middle and background

title: Moon Call
